interpretation: The Crystal Ball is a powerful tool of divination, capable of revealing hidden truths and insights. As a symbol, it represents mystery and prophecy, inviting us to look beyond the surface and explore the depths of our subconscious mind. When this card appears in a reading, it suggests that you may need to tap into your intuition and seek answers from within. You may be facing a situation that requires you to see beyond the obvious, or you may be feeling uncertain about the future. The Crystal Ball urges you to trust your inner wisdom and seek guidance from the universe. This card can also indicate a need for spiritual growth or a desire to connect with your higher self. It reminds you that you have the power to shape your destiny and manifest your desires. Let the Crystal Ball guide you on your journey of self-discovery and enlightenment.
